forecast.name: Overnight
forecast.detailedForecast: Mostly clear, with a low around 52. West northwest wind 14 to 20 mph, with gusts as high as 32 mph.

forecast.name: Saturday
forecast.detailedForecast: Sunny, with a high near 65. West northwest wind 10 to 22 mph, with gusts as high as 28 mph.

weather_report:
In the stillness of the early morning, a gentle clarity blankets Downtown San Francisco, its skyline emerging in stark relief against a low-hanging veil of soft clouds. The brisk northwest winds carry a cadence of whispers, hinting at the invigorating warmth to come as daylight spills over the horizon. With temperatures settling comfortably around 52 degrees, this delicate embrace of a near-summer night offers a sense of refuge before the sun rises and alights the landscape in tones of gold and azure.

As Saturday stretches ahead, the promise of a sunny day unravels, inviting all to step outside under a vast sky that soon will be rich with the warmth of 65 degrees. The winds, still lively, will serenade your movements, so it’s wise to dress in layers—perhaps a light jacket to fend off the morning chill, giving way to a cozy tee as the day unfolds. The absence of fog suggests a sense of freedom, where paths open up to leisurely strolls along the waterfront or time spent lounging at your favorite café, savoring a moment with a book or a friend. Engaging in the simple pleasures of life in this vibrant city—exploring hidden nooks or meandering through its storied streets—will surely fill your heart with the essence of the day.
